question: Question_Section_202_07_(a)
statement:
We want to interpolate through \emph{(0, 1)}, \emph{(1, 0)}, \emph{(2,
2)} using cubic splines

\[f(x) = \begin{cases}
p_1(x), & 0 \leq x \leq 1 \\
p_2(x), & 1 \leq x \leq 2
\end{cases}\]

\textbf{(a)} Write down \emph{p\textsubscript{1}(x)} and
\emph{p\textsubscript{2}(x)} in terms of unknown coefficients.
